short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Timeology is a personalized tool that uses your help to provide you with an accurate estimate of how much homework you have.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Procrastination is a problem all high schoolers face, directly resulting from the lack of being able to quantitively measure how much total work one needs to complete before a set date. Presenting, Timeology, a personalized tool that uses your help to provide you with an accurate estimate of how much homework you have to complete before the next school day. Timeology also notifies you about any upcoming assignments and how long they will take you to complete so that you can plan ahead and better manage your time.

This extension works exclusively on the Schoology webpage and is completely safe. Timeology cannot access any of your private information such as grades, private messages or any other personal info stored on the website.
